metadata.documentation: The EC-EARTH predictor (EURO-CORDEX) dataset includes the historical (1979-2008) and RCP8.5 (2071-2100) experiments of the model EC-EARTH_r12i1p1 (CMIP5 experiment) for a reduced number of predictors (both at surface and at pressure levels), commonly used for Statistical Downscaling (SD). This information was provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) and has been post-processed by the Santander MetGroup, in the framework of the EURO-CORDEX initiative, in order to facilitate the work of the groups contributing to the statistical downscaling experiments.

Provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) on 10/06/2018, and bilinearly interpolated to a 2 deg regular grid for the European domain (30W-42E, 18N-72N) over the period 1979-2008 (historical) and 2071-2100 (RCP8.5), using the climate4R framework from the Santander Meteorology Group (UC-CSIC): http://www.meteo.unican.es/climate4R"; to the European Domain at 2.0 deg resolution to be used within the statistical downscaling experiments of Euro-CORDEX, and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).
Dataset included in the User Data Gateway (UDG, http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki) maintained by the Santander MetGroup. Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset.

The EC-EARTH predictor (EURO-CORDEX) dataset includes the historical (1979-2008) and RCP8.5 (2071-2100) experiments of the model EC-EARTH_r12i1p1 (CMIP5 experiment) for a reduced number of predictors (both at surface and at pressure levels), commonly used for Statistical Downscaling (SD). This information was provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) and has been post-processed by the Santander MetGroup, in the framework of the EURO-CORDEX initiative, in order to facilitate the work of the groups contributing to the statistical downscaling experiments.

Provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) on 10/06/2018, and bilinearly interpolated to a 2 deg regular grid for the European domain (30W-42E, 18N-72N) over the period 1979-2008 (historical) and 2071-2100 (RCP8.5), using the climate4R framework from the Santander Meteorology Group (UC-CSIC): http://www.meteo.unican.es/climate4R"; to the European Domain at 2.0 deg resolution to be used within the statistical downscaling experiments of Euro-CORDEX, and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).
Dataset included in the User Data Gateway (UDG, http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki) maintained by the Santander MetGroup. Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset.

The EC-EARTH predictor (EURO-CORDEX) dataset includes the historical (1979-2008) and RCP8.5 (2071-2100) experiments of the model EC-EARTH_r12i1p1 (CMIP5 experiment) for a reduced number of predictors (both at surface and at pressure levels), commonly used for Statistical Downscaling (SD). This information was provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) and has been post-processed by the Santander MetGroup, in the framework of the EURO-CORDEX initiative, in order to facilitate the work of the groups contributing to the statistical downscaling experiments.

Provided by the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) on 10/06/2018, and bilinearly interpolated to a 2 deg regular grid for the European domain (30W-42E, 18N-72N) over the period 1979-2008 (historical) and 2071-2100 (RCP8.5), using the climate4R framework from the Santander Meteorology Group (UC-CSIC): http://www.meteo.unican.es/climate4R"; to the European Domain at 2.0 deg resolution to be used within the statistical downscaling experiments of Euro-CORDEX, and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).
